keepConnect.name: Degluleen
keepConnect.helperText: Soo bësee ci lëkkalekaay bi tàmbali, kon tëyeel lien bi. Loolu dafay laaj nga bàyyi xel ni lëkkalekaay bi dina wéy di lëkkaloo ginaaw biñu ko tasee.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: URL link, ci misaal ws://192.168.0.0.0.2:7001, wala wws://exmple.com/yoon
url.error: URL bu dëggu bi mooy URL bi ñuy tàmbalee ci ws:// wala wws://
